definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: Firstly, it had created a secure system for uploading classified documents.
sentences.chinese: 首先，它为机密文件创造了一个安全系统。

sentences.english: Don't tell us that these are some of the conferences "top secret" documents.
sentences.chinese: 可别说都是些什么会议上的绝密文件噢。

sentences.english: Two threshold cryptosystems secure against chosen ciphertext attacks are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出两个抗选择密文攻击的门限密码系统。

sentences.english: This is the computer where (=by/on which) he has stolen top-secret documents.
sentences.chinese: 这就是他用来盗窃绝密文件的计算机。

sentences.english: The program will then calculate and display the ciphertext.
sentences.chinese: 该程序将然后计算并显示密文。

sentences.english: So is punishing those who purloin classified materials.
sentences.chinese: 惩罚那些窃取机密文件的人也是可以理解的。

sentences.english: They threaten you to hand out a top-secret document?
sentences.chinese: 他们威胁你把一个绝密文件交出去？

sentences.english: The size of the ciphertext was a constant and independent of the size of the ring.
sentences.chinese: 密文的大小是一个常量，并且与环的大小无关。

sentences.english: The retreat of the accepted Big Other accounts for the prevalence of code-cracking in popular culture.
sentences.chinese: 公认大他者的退却解释了流行文化中破解密文的盛行。

sentences.english: Destroy this top-secret strategy document after reading.
sentences.chinese: 在阅读本文后请务必将这份最高机密文件彻底销毁。

sentences.english: But we are not going to negotiate minimizing or sanitizing classified documents.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们不会就缩减或消毒秘密文件这件事进行谈判。

sentences.english: But how do you go about putting top secret documents online without getting caught?
sentences.chinese: 但是怎样才能在网上发布绝密文件而不被抓到呢？

sentences.english: I am now ready for cipher block chaining.
sentences.chinese: 现在可以进行密文块链接了。

sentences.english: The carrier delivered the confidential disclosure documents.
sentences.chinese: 邮递员传递了已揭密的机密文件。

sentences.english: The anti-secrecy group WikiLeaks has released another trove of U.
sentences.chinese: 反保密组织维基揭密又公布一批美国的秘密文件。

sentences.english: The classfied documents were recommitted into her keeping.
sentences.chinese: 机密文件重新委托她保管。
